sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Otu jikọrọ ndị Ugwu awụsa na-aka ma na -ere ahịa ịyabasị  a kpọrọ 'Onion Producers and Marketers Association of Nigeria (OPMAN) ekpebiela na ha ga-akwụsị ibute ịyabasị na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ.
Odebeego otu ahụ bụ Ibrahim Haruna gwara BBC Igbo ụbọchị Tọzde na nke a bụ n'ihi na ndị otu Ipob zusara ịyabasị juru ụgbọala 'trailer' abụọ nke ego ya ruru nde naira iri abụọ ụbọchị ụka gara aga.
O kwuru na ndị otu ha nọ n'Ugwu Awụsa kpebiri ịkwụsị ibunye ha ahịa dịka onye ndụ otu Ipob bụ Nnamdi Kanu emejupụtaghị nkwa o kwere ịkwụ ndị emebiri ahịa ha ụgwọ ya.
Cheta na Nnamdi Kanu nọrọ n'ozi ọ gbasara n'abalị 31 nke ọnwa Mee, afọ 2021(31/5/2021) katọọ ndị wakporo ndị Ugwu bụ ịyabasị, ma kwe nkwa ịkwụ ha ụgwọ ya n'uju.
Gee ihe ndị a niile n'ihe onyonyo a:
Vidio, Onions traders: 'Anyị ahụbeghị ego Nnamdi Kanu kwuru ọ ga-akwụ anyị maka ịyabasi anyị a bụsara n'Imo', Duration 3,29elekere 6 gara aga
Vidio, Ebonyi herdmen attack: 'Etu ndị ọchiehi si wakpoo anyị, gbụọ otụtụ n'ime anyị', Duration 1,433 Juun 2021
Vidio, Drone Technology: 'Agaghị m ụlọakwụkwọ were mụta etu e si arụ 'drone' - Agbo Samson, Duration 4,022 Juun 2021
Vidio, Biafra: Lee ebe Ojukwu 'zoro' lụọ agha a, Duration 5,3230 Mee 2018
Vidio, Biafra at 50: 'Anyị chere na anyị bịara ịnabata ndị enyi, anyị amaghị na ọ bụ ọnwụ ka anyị na-agakwu' - Onye hụrụ 'Asaba Massacre', Duration 4,1117 Jenụwarị 2020
Vidio, Ọgbambọ: "A na m e ji abalị abụọ arụpụta welding machine n'Aba'- Chinedu Ogboms, Duration 3,421 Juun 2021
Vidio, Ezeribe Chigbu killing: 'Otu ụbọchị ahụ dị m zụtara m ụgbọala ka ndị nchekwa gburu ya n'ime ụgbọala ahụ n'Owere', Duration 8,4422 Mee 2021
Vidio, Father Okunerere: Ihe mere anaghị m agba alụsị m butere ọkụ dịka ụkọchukwu ndị ọzọ, Duration 7,069 Mee 2021
